translation.en: ♪ I can feel it ♪ ♪ Coming in the air tonight ♪
[man] Just when you think it's all over,
something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
murders your sister Jenny in cold blood,
But a clue left behind leads us here,
And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
[man] All right. So about a year ago,
my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
A 10,000-year-old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.ko: 만 년 묵은 전사의 영혼이 지구로 돌아와서

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.ko: 내 절친 카이한테 자기 능력을 넘겼거든

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.ko: 카이랑 루신은 미녀고 난 대장 찰리지

translation.en: -[man 2] You seeing this? -[man 3] You know why we're here.
translation.ko: 보여? 놈들도 우리가 온 줄 알아

translation.en: He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
[man] He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
So why aren't you with them?
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.ko: 난 이 물질을 추적해 태국에 왔어

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
[man] I found it in my dead sister's hand.
Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.ko: 카이랑 루신이랑 우리 가족 식당에 돌아왔는데

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
You want to know a secret?
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
[breathing heavily] I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.ko: 카이, 이게 뭐야? 야! 다시 돌려놔

translation.en: It's me. I need your help.
[man's voice] No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.ko: 오전 8시 실롬 사원 고고학 유적지로 와

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.ko: 내가 두 번 다시 너랑 클럽에 오나 봐라

translation.en: I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.ko: 그 고고학 유적지는 생명공학 업계 갑부 거야

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.ko: 별 정보는 없는데 저 건물을 갖고 있어

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.ko: 제니의 살인범만 찾을 수 있다면 가야지

translation.en: [Tommy] It should be up on the right.
William Pan has formed collaboration agreements
Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.ko: 인류의 가장 난해한 문제를 해결하고자 했죠

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
We're not just looking to the future…
I know my message was unorthodox.
I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.ko: 직접 찾아가지 못해 미안하네 그런 식의 대화는 힘들었어

translation.en: Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.ko: 그 양반이 최초로 아무것도 없는 세계에

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
We all went to Chinese school.
Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu after he became a god.
translation.ko: 화교 학교에서도 반고가 신이 된 후는 안 다뤘잖아

translation.en: Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 오행자객을 소환해 최초의 인간을 쳤어

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order.
These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.ko: 이 영혼들은 수천 년째 싸우고 있어

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced,
chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.ko: 혼돈과 나의 끝없는 전쟁도 막을 내릴 거야

translation.en: And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
while my twin continues to spread chaos.
You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi.
She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.ko: 전 세계를 돌며 위협적인 존재를 제거하고

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
And last month, she went to San Francisco.
Ku An Qi was looking for you,
She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
How do you know all this?
[William] Because Ku and I are connected.
That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her,
This whole thing could be bullshit.
[William] In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.ko: 네 여동생이 싸우다 고의 부적을 뺏었어

translation.en: It's a piece of our Essence.
-She'll try to get it back. -Good. Send her my way.
translation.ko: - 고가 되찾으려고 할 거야 - 그럼 나한테 보내요

translation.en: In two days' time, my worse half
is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel, solidifying her power base.
translation.ko: 비 호텔에서 삼합회 두목 5명과 힘의 기반을 다질 거야
사방에 카메라가 있고 무기는 반입 금지지

translation.en: -There's no honor in guns. -And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.ko: - 총은 믿을 수 없으니까 - 고가 당신 속셈을 모를까요?

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
translation.ko: 최선을 다해 내 생각을 차단 중이야

translation.en: My powers extend to the mind,
while hers are focused on the body.
A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
You know what? I got a better idea.
Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.ko: 당신의 정신 지배 능력을 써서 그냥 군대를 보내요

translation.en: I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.ko: 접근하고 소통하고 잠깐 생각을 멈출 순 있지만

translation.en: -[Lu Xin sighs] -But that is the extent of my powers now.
Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.ko: 모르는 게 없는데 정작 답은 못 찾았네요

translation.en: When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
and I'll take care of the rest.
You said the Dao is broken.
But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.ko: 하지만 너랑 내가 힘을 합치면 복구할 수도 있어

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
[Lu Xin] The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 인간인지 반신인지가 제니를 죽였어

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.ko: 그건 나도 알아 그러니까 머리를 잘 써야지

translation.en: -Look at the pieces in front of us. -This isn't a game.
translation.ko: - 상황 파악 좀 해 - 이건 게임이 아니야

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.ko: 사실 게임이지 모든 게 게임이야, 토미

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.ko: 동생 때문에 목숨 걸려면 너 혼자…

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
-[Lu Xin] That's the game. No one's safe. -[Tommy] Ah, fuck you, man.
-Yeah, fuck you too. -[Kai] Guys! Calm down.
translation.ko: - 그래, 너도 닥치셔 - 둘 다 흥분하지 마

translation.en: Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.ko: 고안기는 오행자객을 원하니까 소원대로 내가 가야지

translation.en: -No. -It might not be the smartest choice,
but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.ko: 집어치워 안 돼, 나 혼자 할 거야

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai?
You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
Lu Xin is calling his contact.
Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
translation.ko: 고를 처리할 로켓포도 구할 수 있대?

translation.en: Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.ko: 이 손가락을 가볍게 쥐면 훨씬 쉬워

translation.en: I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
That's… that's not how you fight.
You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.ko: 강시 임무 때 도와준 놈이 날 차단했거든

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi,
I might know someone crazy enough to help.
What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
translation.ko: 뭐? - 방콕 여자는 또 언제 만났어? - 확실하다곤 안 했다
- 방콕 여자는 또 언제 만났어? - 확실하다곤 안 했다

translation.en: Something just doesn't feel right about this.
-Hey! -It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with.
Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.ko: - 웬 토머스? - 일단 왜 여기서 보자고 했어?

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
[man] You know who I work for?
We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.ko: 너희 삼합회가 테러범 고안기를 만나기로 했잖아

translation.en: You might wanna call in the cleaners.
I thought he gave you the information.
-Lu, is that a "Sin" or a "Xin"? -Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.ko: - 신이야? 쉰이야? - 설마 재밌다고 한 말?

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.

translation.ko: 네 동생은 어디 있어? 여기 없어

translation.en: That's too bad. I love Jen.
Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
If you know, then why are you helping?
I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.ko: 사소한 건 무시해 큰 그림을 봐야지

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.ko: 너희가 상대하는 여자 장난 아니야 닥치는 대로 죽이지

translation.en: How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.ko: 5년 전에 여기 왔을 때 누가 내 명품 가방을 훔쳤거든

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.ko: 그래서 경찰에 신고했는데 손 놓고 있는 거야

translation.en: -So, someone told me to go talk to-- -Uh.
I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet,
translation.ko: 내가 한 줄로 깔끔하게 정리해 줄게

translation.en: in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.ko: 토미는 털렸고 그 여자에 대해 쥐뿔도 몰라

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
-We need this. -[Preeya] And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.ko: - 꼭 필요하다고 - 지금 고를 처지는 아니잖아

translation.en: -[Tommy] Did you get it? -[Preeya] Yes, every goddamn thing.
translation.ko: - 우리 말 들었어? - 한마디도 안 빼놓고

translation.en: Listen. I know it's none of my business.
But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.ko: 이 남자가 좋거든 그래서 충고하는데 너희 계획은…

translation.en: There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.ko: 죽었다 깨나도 비 호텔에 무기 못 가져가

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.ko: 보안은 철통이고 입구는 딱 현관 하나야

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.ko: 내일 같이 가서 제니 살인범을 잡을 거야

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
I can help you get in.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.ko: 보안이 철저하니까 우린 그걸 역으로 이용하면 돼

translation.en: Is this your idea of a joke?
[Preeya] Wow. What's so special about them?
We're gonna get justice for her.
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
[Tommy] Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
translation.ko: 우리가 뭘 어쨌다고 이래? 아무 짓 안 했는데

translation.en: -All right. Easy. Easy. -[Tommy] Can I talk to your manager?
translation.ko: - 진정들 하지 - 당신이 지배인이야? - 그래 - 진정해

translation.en: One-star Yelp review on the way!
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.ko: 이건 태국 물 축제 송끄란 때 쓰는 거야

translation.en: Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
translation.ko: 좋은 말 할 때 가방 정리해

translation.en: You for real? [Tommy] Yes, I'm for real.
-[guard] Bullshit! -[Tommy] Look at all this mess.
[in English] Where is our fucking visual?
-I'm working on it. -[Zulu] Our gear is still working.
translation.ko: - 복구 중입니다 - 우리 장비는 작동 중이야

translation.en: Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] You are my men now.
Come on. Let's get out of here.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
-[Zulu] Hands where I can see 'em. -[gun cocks]
translation.ko: 내가 볼 수 있게 손 들어

translation.en: -[Kai] You know her? -Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.ko: 애스턴 마틴을 처분하려고 했는데 중개인이 인터폴이더라

translation.en: -Look, hey, these bodies-- -Get down on your knees!
So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.ko: 발 들여 보니 시체가 쌓여 있었어?

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.ko: 자마, 나 알잖아 내가 이럴 사람이야?

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
Try me. The fate of the world.
Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.ko: 부셰 요원, 용의자 둘을 확보했다 지원 바람

translation.en: Whoever got them probably got your team.
Interlace your fingers behind your head, -and get down on the floor. -[chuckling]
translation.ko: 머리 뒤로 손깍지 끼고 바닥에 엎드려

translation.en: -I don't want to hurt you. -Kai. Don't.
translation.ko: - 당신 해치기 싫은데 - 카이, 안 돼

translation.en: Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.ko: 친구 말 듣지 이성적인 사람 같은데

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.ko: 별말을 다 들어 보네, 총 내려

translation.en: -What the fuck happened here? -We're working on it.
Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.ko: 일단 우리 중에 악당이 없는 건 확실한데

translation.en: -I got it. -I'm just looking out for you.
translation.ko: - 내가 알아서 해 - 그냥 지켜 준 거야

translation.en: -Because that's always been your MO. -Here we go again.
[Preeya] Did you guys, like, used to date or--
The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
Looks like you're not the only special one.
[Tommy] Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
Don't worry about Kai, all right?
-[Lu Xin] Yo, we gotta go. Come on. -My van's still here. Come on!
translation.ko: - 빨리 피해야겠다 - 아직 내 밴이 있어, 가자

translation.en: -[Lu Xin] What happened back there? -What happened in here?
translation.ko: - 아까 어떻게 된 거야? - 여긴 어떻게 된 거야?

translation.en: If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.ko: 내가 찝찝하다고 말릴 때 말 들었어야지

translation.en: Get me out of here now.
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
Can you get to Khaosan Road?
[Zulu] It's the end of the road.
-She's locking down the city. -What are we gonna do?
I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.ko: 운하에 가서 배 타고 짜오프라야강으로 가자 그 계획은…

translation.en: [Ku An Qi, in Thai] Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
translation.ko: 놈들을 차에서 끌어내 내 앞에 데려와

translation.en: [in English] I changed my mind. I like the plan.
translation.ko: 다시 생각해 보니 괜찮은 계획 같아

translation.en: -If you wanna join me, guns are up top. -[Preeya] Come on.
translation.ko: 같이 싸우겠다면 총은 위에 있어 받아

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
[Lu Xin] They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
-♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ -Good timing.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.ko: 내가 남아 있었다면 쇠고랑 찼을 테니까

translation.en: -[Kai] Get us out of here! -[Tommy] Come on!
[Lu Xin] Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
translation.ko: 거의 다 왔어, 바로 요 앞이야

translation.en: I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
translation.ko: 두 번 다시 못 보는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: [Tommy, in English] Everyone's excited to see you.
-It's been a while since I was last here. -[Tommy] What about your family?
They were long gone before that.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
He knows everything about the supernatural.
If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.ko: 이 상황을 설명해 줄 수 있는 사람은 차트리야

translation.en: [in Thai] You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
[in English] It's nice to meet everyone.
[Chatree] Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.ko: 이렇게 귀한 손님을 모시게 돼 영광이군

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
One that I just made up.
There will always be people after you.
But it is not for you.
You speak like Yoda, old man.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.ko: 윌리엄 반이 모든 걸 말한 건 아니야

translation.en: Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
But they are not in opposition to each other.
They are two halves of a whole.
They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.ko: 그들의 모든 출생과 삶 죽음과 환생을 거치면서

translation.en: And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.ko: 둘의 힘으로 자기들이 원하는 세계를 재창조하려고

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.ko: 둘은 각자 고대의 정을 가지고 있어

translation.en: forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.ko: 카이의 기를 그 두 조각에 주입하면

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
I've had quite enough, thank you.
This whole thing is just crazy. [sighs]
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
this supernatural shit and the world ending.
What did you do when you first found out?
translation.ko: 처음 알았을 때 당신은 뭐 했어?

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
So you could say it was a little bit weird.
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.ko: 브릭 레인에서 마셨던 중국 위스키만 하려고

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
-[sighs] -Is that what I was to you?
I can taste when you're lying.
-[Kai] You're not worried about us losing? -[Chatree] No, I'm not.
translation.ko: - 우리가 질 걱정은 안 해요? - 전혀

translation.en: Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
But that is the one thing
that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.ko: 오행자객이 가질 수 없는 게 있지

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
It's my responsibility to protect them.
But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.ko: 하지만 반고는 모든 걸 통제하려 해

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
There is the path that leads to the main road.
From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
You did not come here to train
Last time I was here was, um…
Family had a farm by the river.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
No clash for the world. It was, uh,
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.ko: 난 할 수 있는 게 없어 가족을 되살릴 수 없지

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.ko: 하지만 젠의 한은 풀 수 있다고 생각했어

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
translation.ko: 넌 할 수 있는 일이라도 있잖아

translation.en: [William] It's the version of the village in your mind
from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again.
We can make it into whatever we want.

translation.ko: 다시 가족과 평생 함께할 수 있어

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
-[in English] What are you doing? -I had no choice.
-There's more down there. Let's go. -[Lu Xin] Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.ko: 저기 더 있어, 가자 토미, 잠깐만!

translation.en: I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here.
-No. She wouldn't. -What? She took Ku An Qi's necklace.

translation.ko: - 제길 - 루, 자마를 데려와 토미는 차로 가!

translation.en: -Hold on. We're stronger together. -Just do as I say!
translation.ko: - 뭉쳐야 적수가 되지 - 내 말대로 해!

translation.en: Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.ko: 나도 알아 반의 부하들과 떠났어, 가자

translation.en: You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go!
-No! Chatree! -[Lu Xin] Get in the car!
-[Zulu] We need to go! -[Lu Xin] Drive, Tommy!
-Should have listened to me. -There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.ko: - 내 말을 들었어야지 - 들을 말이 있어야지

translation.en: -I made a decision. -Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
-I'm leading us. -No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
-What the fuck you talking about? -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.ko: 네가 데려온 여자 친구가 우리 뒤통수쳤잖아

translation.en: [Tommy] You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.ko: 카이, 넌 뭐 했어? 어쩔 생각이었는데?

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
-Like I should have done. -Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.ko: - 애초에 생각한 대로 - 그래, 항상 네 말이 진리니까

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you.
translation.ko: - 너 필요 없어, 너희 전부! - 맞아!
- 너 필요 없어, 너희 전부! - 맞아! 나 혼자 갈 거야

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -[Zulu] Just stop it!
Do I need to remind you
that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.ko: 현실을 파괴하려는 신을 막아야 할 거 아냐?

translation.en: You're not acting like a family,
not one that's about to save the world.
Because you cannot even take care of each other.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.ko: 반의 사원에 갔을 때 분리 문양을 봤어

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.ko: 반의 사원에 갔을 때 분리 문양을 봤어 다른 발굴 현장의 공장 사진에서

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.ko: 돌이 나온 곳이니까 - 그 현장으로 가야 해 - 알았어

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like,
No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.ko: 놈들을 못 막으면 우리 모두를 노릴 테니까

translation.en: As long as we're smart about it.
-Let's go kill a god. -[Tommy] Let's do it.
translation.ko: - 신을 죽이러 가자 - 해 보는 거야

translation.en: There are a lot of guards here.
[Ku An Qi] This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
[Ku An Qi] This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.ko: 몇 명이 더 희생돼야 내 가족을 되찾을 수 있지?

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.ko: 죽음이 끝이라고 생각하는 네 인식이 문제야

translation.en: [Tommy] That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
-Those are the main pressing machines. -[Lu Xin] How do you know?
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
-What do you want to do? -We're splitting up.
Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
You guys find Pan and Ku.
Try this. It's got good range.
I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.ko: 네 아빠 졸개 시절의 과거는 싹 지우기로

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.ko: 목걸이는 없어 그걸 못 찾으면 이거 다 헛짓인데

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.ko: 놈들도 바보는 아니니까 다른 데 찾아보자

translation.en: -The fuck were you thinking? -Wait. No. Stop.
They told me I could see my family again,
translation.ko: 내 가족을 다시 만날 수 있댔어

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
Mastery over the body has its perks.
This is for all of us.
[in deep voice] I am Pan Gu, the first man.
Control of mind, body, and soul.
The trouble is, you are but one man,
Brother, I don't want to do this.
[in demon voice] Thank you for your sacrifice.
We can't do this without you.
-[Zulu] Come on. You can do it. -Fucking bitch.
I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
translation.ko: 더 큰 문제가 생긴 것 같아 - 루! - 가자

translation.en: Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.ko: 뭘 물어보고 지랄이야? 나 아니면 누구겠어?

translation.en: -I can't hold. -[Lu Xin] Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
-You guys know knots? -We're about to find out.
translation.ko: - 매듭 묶을 줄 알아? - 이제 알게 되겠지

translation.en: [Tommy] We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.ko: 이거로 끌어 올리자 밧줄 충분해지면 알려 줘

translation.en: Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
Let me know when you guys are good.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
[Tommy] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.ko: 내가 진짜 안전한 출구를 알아 가자

translation.en: Hold it, man. First, a toast.

translation.ko: - 가족을 위하여 - 가족을 위하여! - 건배 - 건배

translation.en: I guess we're going on vacation then.
-We? I thought you could handle yourself. -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.ko: 모두가 봤지만 굳이 말할 필요 없어

translation.en: -[Kai] You wanna spar? You wanna try me? -Do I want to spar?
I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
-[Tommy] You gonna let him say that? -Oh!
-[Zulu] Oh my God. That's crazy. -[Tommy] Guys, guys, guys.
translation.ko: - 대박 - 그건 나도 한다! - 얘들아 - 너무 쉽잖아

translation.en: -[Kai] Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Tommy] He's going in. Get him in the water.
